banner.title: Development Planning Solution
banner.content: With this system, which works fully integrated with Mor Corporate Consulting, we enable the development process of an employee in priority development areas (competencies, skills, etc.) to be individually planned and the most appropriate development solutions to be mapped to the needs here.

solutions.title: Goal Setting
solutions.desc: What competencies should I focus on to develop?

solutions.title: Leveling
solutions.desc: What is and should be my maturity level in a competency I am focused on?

solutions.title: Development Support
solutions.desc: What development actions will I take to achieve this goal?

solutions.title: Choosing from Supporting Activities
solutions.desc: Which trainings will I receive from Mor Corporate?

solutions.title: Regular Evaluations
solutions.desc: How much progress have I made?

about.title: About Us
about.smallTitle: All details about 7000+ Turkish digital content are now on the Mor Corporate website!

news.smallContent: As Mor Corporate, we are happy to receive our ISO 10002 Customer Satisfaction Certificate by signing one of the firsts of our sector!

materials.title: ‍We Made it Easy for Education Managers to Share Videos in Social Groups
materials.content: Eğitim yöneticilerinin daha önceden sisteme tanımladıkları videoları Sosyal gruplarda ve platformdaki tüm yorum alanlarında kolayca paylaşabilmesini sağladık.

materials.title: ‍‍We Designed a Better Experience for List Pages Within the Platform
materials.content: Gerek eğitim yöneticileri, gerekse son kullanıcıların gördüğü listeleme sayfalarının sayfa içerisine yayılarak daha geniş bir alanda ve daha iyi bir görsel deneyimle görüntülenmesini sağladık. Örneğin eğitim yöneticileri için etkinlik listeleri, son kullanıcılar için eğitim geçmişi sayfaları bu düzenleme ile yepyeni bir görünüme kavuştu.

materials.title: ‍In addition to these, many innovations and improvements in report pages, survey listing, event detail pages, and dictionary usage met with Purple Corporate Platform users this month.

news.title: Software and Programming Trainings are at Mor Corporate!
